title: Beau - Creation (1972, 2008) (UK psych folk) (mp3, 320 kbps)
description:
Beau - "Creation"  (1972)  (2008 reissue)  (UK psych folk)  (mp3, 320 kbps)

includes cover scans and bonus track not on original LP


Track list:

01. 9 Minutes - 2.53
02. There Once Was A Time - 3.40
03. Spider - 2.40
04. April Meteor - 2.44
05. Is This Your Day - 3.06
06. Creation - 4.09
07. Blind Faith - 3.55
08. Ferris Street - 2.20
09. Release - 2.38
10. A Reason To Be - 3.22
11. Silence Returns - 3.56
Bonus:
12. Sky Dance - 2.58



Beau is a specialist twelve-string guitar player who became known in the late 1960s through his recordings for John Peel's Dandelion label.  He released a single ('1917 Revolution') and two albums on Dandelion: "Beau" (1969) and "Creation" (1971) which featured Jim Milne and Steve Clayton from Tractor as backing musicians on some tracks.
